item.title: Guida Bayesiana per Autostoppisti
item.author: Author
item.description:
Happy to share my invited webinar from the Italian Society of Psychophysiology and Cognitive Neuroscience (SIPF) about a general introduction on Bayesian Statistics, and my first Shiny presentation ;)

Sorry, only available in Italian.
